title: Dry weather forecast for city
content:
BAHAWALPUR, Sep 05 (APP):The local Met Office has forecast dry weather for the city for the next 24 hours.
The highest maximum temperature of 37 centigrade and the lowest minimum 26 centigrade were recorded during the last 24 hours.
The dry weather has also been forecast for the rest of the region.
